RGB LED Example

Below you can test out the functionality of the RGB LED that I am asking you to recreate with your arduino, breadboard, and the components given.

Notes

  • The potentiometer here is linear, but yours is a knob. The concept is the same
  • If the circle on this page is black that indicates the LED would be off, whereas if the circle is white that means all 3 colors are turned up all the way.
